name: api_math_LayerMask
description: Specifies Layers to use in a Physics.Raycast.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Converts a layer mask value to an integer value.

properties.name: GetMask
properties.description: Given a set of layer names as defined by either a Builtin or a User Layer in the Tags and Layers manager, returns the equivalent layer mask for all of them.

properties.name: LayerToName
properties.description: Given a layer number, returns the name of the layer as defined in either a Builtin or a User Layer in the Tags and Layers manager.

properties.name: NameToLayer
properties.description: Given a layer name, returns the layer index as defined by either a Builtin or a User Layer in the Tags and Layers manager.
